import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { useHistory, Link } from "react-router-dom" class Articalelist extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { article: [] }; } getUsersData() { const { auth } = this.props const article = [] axios({ url: '/api/v1/users/get_article', headers: { 'access-token': auth.accessToken, 'client': auth.client, 'uid': auth.uid, 'expiry': auth.expiry, 'token-type': 'Bearer' } }).then(res => { const data = res.data if(data.success){ data.articles.forEach( (article, i) => { article.push( {article.image} {article.title} {article.publish_date} {article.is_publish} {article.content} {article.view_count} edit show delete ) }) this.setState({article}) } console.log(data) }).catch(error => { console.log(error) }) } componentDidMount(){ this.getUsersData() } render() { return (

Articles

) } } function mapStateToProps(state) { const { auth } = state return { auth } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Articalelist)
